mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_brokerage_sa ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, handling_date, user_id, receive_type_id, school_id, start_date, end_date, tuition_fee, commission, gst, deduct_gst, bonus, adviser_id, official_id, is_close) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{handlingDate}, #{userId}, #{receiveTypeId}, #{schoolId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{tuitionFee}, #{commission}, #{gst}, #{deductGst}, #{bonus}, #{adviserId}, #{officialId}, 0);
mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(bonus), 0.00) from b_brokerage_sa where DATE_FORMAT(gmt_create, '%Y%m') = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') and is_close = 0;

SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, handling_date AS handlingDate, user_id AS userId, receive_type_id AS receiveTypeId, school_id AS schoolId, start_date AS startDate, end_date AS endDate, tuition_fee AS tuitionFee, commission, gst, deduct_gst AS deductGst, bonus, adviser_id AS adviserId, official_id AS officialId, is_close AS isClose FROM b_brokerage_sa WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_brokerage_sa WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
